column4: Abyone heard of this problem:  I have a season of a TV show that isn't playing properly in mplayer.  The audio of the music and background noise is at full, normal volume, but all the dialogue is way low-volume.  The same file(s) played in VLC works fine.
is music also quiet, or just dialog? Maybe mplayer is using some kind of surround output that treats the vocal channel differently.
Yeah, it's only the dialogue which is low-volume.
